function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low ventilation rates in indoor spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates and effectiveness","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, personalized ventilation","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing distances","Impact":"Greater risk of disease transmission within close proximity","Mitigation":"Enforce and adhere to safe social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Informational signage, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Individuals in social settings","Owner":"Business owners, event organizers"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread through the air","Mitigation":"Utilize proper ventilation, filtration, and air purification systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air purifiers, UV sterilization","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations, building owners"}]}
